    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Turtle Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1845)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This harness of _[+1 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2804) [ half plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=49)_ is made from the shell plates of a [dragon turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2956) and has the [aquadynamic](/Traits.aspx?ID=792) trait. To those who can craft with them, the dense organic plates on the dragon turtle’s body are as valuable as the creature’s hoard of gold.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))  **Trigger** A creature adjacent to you targets you with a melee attack;  **Effect** You roll the hefty plates of the dragon turtle armor toward the attacker to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the shell of a dragon turtle.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
